name: launchmon
description:
Software infrastructure that enables HPC run-time tools to co-locate
tool daemons with a parallel job.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: libgcrypt
dependencies.description: Cryptographic library based on the code from GnuPG.

dependencies.name: libgpg-error
dependencies.description: Common error values for all GnuPG components.

dependencies.name: elf
dependencies.description:
libelf lets you read, modify or create ELF object files in an
architecture-independent way. The library takes care of size and endian
issues, e.g. you can process a file for SPARC processors on an Intel-
based system. Note: libelf is no longer maintained and packages that
depend on libelf should migrate to elfutils.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: spectrum-mpi
dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.

dependent_to.name: spindle
dependent_to.description:
Spindle improves the library-loading performance of dynamically linked
HPC applications. Without Spindle large MPI jobs can overload on a
shared file system when loading dynamically linked libraries, causing
site-wide performance problems.

dependent_to.name: stat
dependent_to.description: Library to create, manipulate, and export graphs Graphlib.
